item.description:
It's a member request festival! We're heading to the Lawrence Heritage Days Bread and Roses Folk Festival on Labor Day.

Check out the website at: http://breadandrosesh..., and click on the "Festival" tab for the schedule and driving directions. This is a T accessible event using the Haverill/Reading line..please note the holiday schedule mimic's the sunday schedule: http://www.mbta.com/s...

We'll plan to meet at the main stage at noon and stick around for some gospel at 12:15 and be back there for big band gig at 1:30. As ever, will send my cell number to the yes's and maybe's to try and coordinate meeting, but will stop accepting calls once the music starts at 12:15. Will check for text after each music set so we can try and connect (especially for those commuter rail folks arriving at 12:30)

In addition, if folks wish to carpool, we'll plan to meet at the framingham park and ride off of exit 12 at 10:30 am. It's the SECOND LOCATION mentioned here: http://www.ctps.org/b.... i.e. do not head anywhere near shopper's world!!!

Buzz me with questions!
Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the chick in my photos at any of the mentioned meeting spots, or use my cell up until 12:15 pm
item.name: Lawrence Bread and Roses Festival
